Metadata.Title: 10.2.5 Log Authentication and User Management Events

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.5
==Policy Statement==
Log authentication and user management events.
==Policy Purpose==
Log authentication events to help identify users who were online when an incident was taking place. Log user management events to help investigate unauthorized changes to user accounts.
